channel.title: How Do You Change Your Starting Equipement?
channel.description: When a new player loggs in, how do you change what they start off with?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 25, 2007, 02:30:16 PM[/size][hr]?

item.title: How Do You Change Your Starting Equipement?
item.dc:creator: @zezi111 zezi111
item.source: How Do You Change Your Starting Equipement?

item.title: How Do You Change Your Starting Equipement?
item.dc:creator: @The_Moose The Moose
item.description:
@The_Moose wrote:

Simple, Go into your player.java, Find the line of text “Giving your character a unique look” and somewehre under you should see something like
playerhat
playerring
playerbody
playerlegs
and stuff like that and next to that you should see item codes, change the codes to what items you want, be sure to put the items in the slots they go into, save, compile, run :]
hope this helped ~ The (ORIGINAL) Moose

Read full topic
item.source: How Do You Change Your Starting Equipement?

item.title: How Do You Change Your Starting Equipement?
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

go into your player.java file. then search for

//Giving the player an unique look

and add the equiptments name where it belongs once you get there its self explainitory
